casebody.data:
The PAINE & WILLIAMS COMPANY, Appellant, v. The TRUMP PRODUCTS COMPANY, Appellee. No. 7105. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. Jan. 15, 1937. Fay, Oberlin & Fay, of Cleveland, Ohio, for appellant. A. L. Ely, of Cleveland, Ohio, for appellee.

Before HICKS, SIMONS, and ALLEN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The decree in this cause is affirmed for the reasons stated by the trial court (18 F. Supp.-), in its opinion of January 5,1935.
